findings.details: Using actions/checkout@v4, actions/setup-python@v5, astral-sh/setup-uv@v4. All are current stable versions.
CI triggers on push to main/master and PRs. PR workflow triggers on PR events only. Proper scope.
Build job needs: [lint, typecheck, test]. Ensures all checks pass before build.
Using uv which has built-in caching. setup-uv action handles cache management.
Build artifacts uploaded via actions/upload-artifact@v4. Coverage reports uploaded to Codecov.
PYTHON_VERSION in workflow-level env. Secrets accessed at job/step level as needed.
Both workflows pass YAML validation. Proper indentation and structure.

findings.check: Uses uv for fast package management
findings.details: Using astral-sh/setup-uv for fast Python package installation. 10-100x faster than pip.

recommendation: APPROVED - Follows GitHub Actions best practices. Uses modern tooling (uv) for performance.
